indications:
Indications see notes above; chronic amoebiasis and as adjunct
to metronidazole or tinidazole in acute amoebiasis
name: DILOXANIDE FUROATE
doses:
500 mg every 8 hours for 10 days; child body-weight over 25 kg, 20 mg/kg daily in 3
divided doses for 10 days; body-weight under 25 kg, see BNF for Children
pregnancy: Pregnancy manufacturer advises avoid—no information available
